question: For the past few years I have been experiencing facial numbness that starts on my gums and lower lip then moves to my cheek and nose. Recently it has been spreading to the other side of my face and/or forehead. This lasts for several mimutes and is growing in length everyday.This is worrying me as I'm waiting on getting blood tests and my appointment isn't til March 6th.I am hypoglycemic and have a family history of type 2 diabetes.Could this be any of the above or does it sound like b-12 defeciency?Thanks for any help!
title: Facial numbness, tingling is spreading
